title: Launch: URBAN REFUGEES
desc:
URBAN REFUGEES is a not for profit organisation dedicated to improving the lives of urban refugees in developing countries. After operating from Paris for three years, we have launched a sister organisation in New York. We invite you to join us for holiday drinks for our introduction to the New York Community as we fundraise for upcoming programing and share 2016-2017 initiatives that aim to change the current refugee landscape. 7:00pm: Event Start 7:45pm: Co-Founder Marilena Hatoupis introduces URBAN REFUGEES 8:00pm: Co-Founder & Executive Director, Sonia Ben Ali, skypes in from Paris? 9:00pm: Raffle Winner Announcements 10:00pm: Event Close * First drink is free and raffle ticket is included with the ticket purchase. Food can be ordered from the bar menu.   Proceedings from the evening will go to supporting our programs . 
 We look forward to seeing you!
